item.title: Poor Man's Pausepoint
item.description: If you’re familiar with the Jetbrains Rider IDE and have used it for Unity development then you may be aware of a feature they provide called pausepoints. Similar to normal breakpoints but, unlike them, they do not suspend the application nor give you call stack information. Instead it allows the developer to pause the editor when in play mode just like what happens when the user clicks the pause button in the game view.
